tool_description: This API showing few books details, like: title, author, image url, price, review and description. For this API I used JavaScript, node, express and nodemon.
name: Bookshelves
title: Bookshelves

api_list.name: Get All Books Details
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the books details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bookshelves.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookshelves.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bookshelves.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookshelves.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
